channel.title: My selection option only has 2 options
channel.description:
How do i make a select options have 4 - 5 options?
This is mine now
[code]selectoption("Go to village.", "Go into slayer cave.", "Cancel.", "");[/code]
tY.

item.title: My selection option only has 2 options
item.dc:creator: @parkview parkview
item.description:
@parkview wrote:

[quote=“whosdr, post:2, topic:201050”]…!!!

what on earth are you talking about?[/quote]

That code there, makes a select option screen right? But only shows two options show up. But I want 4 to show up. Get it now?
